casebody.data:
UNION COUNTY
v.
TOWN OF MARSHVILLE 411P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 15, 2016 Karlene Scott Turrentine, Attorney at Law, Warrenton, for Town of Marshville. S. C. Kitchen, Attorney at Law, Durham. J. Daniel Bishop, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Union County. Scott A. Hefner, Attorney at Law. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th of November 2016 by Defendant for Temporary Stay: "Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of November 2016." Ervin, J. recused
